pullrequest.title: add support for 'stopCmd' and 'logsCmd' in simulations, and other changes

content.raw: Were you able to test posting to the cloudsim-sim server? I just realized that users may not be authorized to call the cloudsim-sim REST APIs because they don't have permissions. I created [cloudsim-portal pull request #63](#!/osrf/cloudsim-portal/pull-requests/63/populate-cloudsim-sim-with-initial/diff) to fix this.
content.html: Were you able to test posting to the cloudsim-sim server? I just realized that users may not be authorized to call the cloudsim-sim REST APIs because they don't have permissions. I created cloudsim-portal pull request #63 to fix this.
